0.1.1.name: wordpress/qudian
0.1.1.description: Qudian is similar to social bookmarking services with addition of keyword selection. Qudian helps users to share reading clues by adding and liking Qudians. Users can login using their social networking sites (for now, Sina Weibo is supported). In addition, users build personal interest index over time. Qudian augments reading experience by promoting collaborative reading and enhancing reading efficiency.
